name: LiveCode Stack File
summary: Learn about .LIVECODE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To create a LIVECODE file, select File → New Mainstack, a window, or Card, should appear, make your edits, select File → Save or Save As... or Share This Stack..., name your file, choose the save location, and click Save.
To open a LIVECODE file, simply click the file, or select File → Open Stack... or Open Recent File, navigate to your LIVECODE file, select it, and click Open.

description: Stack file created by LiveCode, a multi-platform application builder; contains a Stack which holds one or more Cards; a Card controls the appearance of the application, which includes a variety of buttons, menus, boxes, scrollbars, tables, and more.
